description:
Takayuki has been put in charge for the promotinal campaign of the movie adaption of his childhood friend`s novel. Wanting to create something great for his friend Motoharu, he get fired up about his assignment. However, unlike his motivation, the ideas are just not coming. In order to clear his head, he takes a break outside where he randomly runs into Motoharu, who reminds him of something very important.
Source: crunchyroll
